sourceDesc.p: Retrieved from Grabber Zone (https://grabber.zone/comics/sonic-idw/2018-2019-neo-metal-sonic-saga/sonic-the-hedgehog-01/), an online Sonic comic collection gathered for educational purposes

p.note: A value of 'NNC' for the cbml:panel element's 'characters' attribute is an acronym standing for No Named Characters, meaning no characters with names appeared in the panel.
A '(?)' within a note with a type value of 'panelDesc' means that the encoding author saw something unidentifiable, or else is unsure of their own identification.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Sonic the Hedgehog has spent years fighting the forces of Dr. Eggman.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic confronts the Egg Viper.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Time and again the mad doctor attacks, Sonic strikes back, then relaxes until Eggman returns.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic fights the Egg Emperor.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But after their last battle...
cbml:panel.note: Sonic battles the Egg Dragoon.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: ...Dr. Eggman vanished...
cbml:panel.note: Sonic confronts the Death Egg Robot.
Sonic runs in the middle of the page.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: ...but his robot army did not!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Whuh-oh--that doesn't look good.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic sees missiles firing onto a fortress.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Sounds like the locals are putting up a fight. I hope they don't mind me lending a hand!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic starts running to the fortress.
Sonic runs into the fortress.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Run! Get to the storm bunker!
cbml:panel.note: An unnamed wolf-like character directs an unnamed bear-like character and an unnamed birdlike character to seek shelter at a storm bunker as two Egg Pawns chase the animals.
An Egg Pawn approaches the wolf character as the wolf nervously clutches his Blue Cube Wispon.
The Egg Pawn knocks the wolf character to the ground, causing him to collapse and drop his Blue Cube Wispon.
A group of Egg Pawns approach the collapsed wolf character.
Sonic zooms into the Egg Pawns, destroying them as the wolf watches.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hey! You hurt?
N-Not really. You're... You're Sonic!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic asks the wolf if the wolf is hurt, and the wolf feels excited to see Sonic.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You're... the Sonic!
The one and only. Here you go. Try swinging it at the robots next time. I knew somebody who put it to good use.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic suggests to the wolf that the wolf uses the Blue Cube Wispon the next time the Egg Pawns confront the wolf.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Maybe get inside, buddy. Nice chat! Need to save your town. Bye!
O-Okay!
cbml:panel.note: As Sonic runs off to save the wolf's town, Sonic advises the wolf to take shelter.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Sweet! The town militia! Bots coming in from the north! You've got a guy holding his own out there!
O-Okay! We're on it!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic warns the town militia that robots are coming from the north as he speeds past three of the militia's members and tells them that he will protect them.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hurry up! They're closing in!
I'm trying! It's stuck!
cbml:panel.note: Another unnamed catlike character tells a struggling unnamed male birdlike character to open a storm cellar-like door as three Motobugs approach them.
Sonic speeds past the Motobugs and toward the two animal civilians.
Sonic winks and poses in front of the two animal civilians as the Motobugs break.
Sonic speeds past the two animal civilians.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ...All this terror might be worth it if I get to say Sonic winked at me!
I hope we survive long enough to get his autograph!
cbml:panel.note: The cat and the bird feel happy that Sonic rescued them from the Motobugs.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The remaining robots are making a run for it!
cbml:panel.note: Tails alerts Sonic that the remaining Egg Hammers are escaping the fortress.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: We can't risk them attacking another town. You cut them off! I'll handle the Super Badnik!
On it!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Tails charge toward one of the Egg Hammers.
Sonic smashes into one of the Egg Hammers' ankle, crushing it.
Sonic dodges the Egg Hammer's attack by bouncing off a rooftop.
Sonic runs up the Egg Hammer's arm.
Sonic speeds through the Egg Hammer's head, breaking it in half.
As the destroyed Egg Hammer falls, Sonic starts to land on the ground unharmed.
Sonic sticks his landing as the Egg Hammer impales its deactivated body through its hammer.
Tails flies to the top of a chain lift system that is conected to a massive door.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: They're almost out! C'mon, Tails! Hurry up!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic yells to Tails to close the door.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Oh ye of little faith...
cbml:panel.note: Tails pulls a lever that closes the door.
The door swings shut behind the escaping Egg Hammers.
Three Motobugs crash into the door as it slams shut in front of them.
Sonic runs past some Egg Pawns ad Motobugs as he watches them fall apart from running into the shut door.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Well?
cbml:panel.note: Tails asks Sonic how Tails did in helping Sonic destroy the remaining Badniks.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Expertly done. Bonus points for dramatic timing.
Thank you, thank you.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic praises Tails for helping him destroy the remaining Badniks.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Another day saved thanks to Sonic and Tails! These rogue robots are more like pests than anything.
Normally I'd agree...
cbml:panel.note: Sonic feels proud about saving the town, but Tails feels that something is not right.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ...but this was a much more coordinated attack. At least compared to anything we've seen lately.
cbml:panel.note: Tails explains to Sonic that the town was under a coordinated attack.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Really? I hadn't noticed.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic tells Tails that Sonic did not know that the attack was coordinated.
Tails looks frustratedly at Sonic because Sonic still does not understand what went on.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Okay--FINE--the Egg Hammers were new to the mix.
That's not what I mean.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic believes that the Egg Hammers were unfamiliar to him.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: After we beat Dr. Eggman and his forces, we broke the Eggman Empire's control over our world.
cbml:panel.note: Tails starts explaining to Sonic why the Badnik attack happened. In the background, we see a view of the fortress town with a sepia tone to introduce a flashback.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: "The Badnik army remained, but not as a unified threat. Any attacks seemed more like accidents than aggression."
cbml:panel.note: We see a sepia-toned flashback of two Motobugs bumping into each other and an Egg Pawn walking on a cliff, with Tails explaining in the background that the Badnik Army was still active.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: But today--unified troop movements? Super Badniks being deployed? Setting up ambushes? Something is making Eggman's army more cohesive.
cbml:panel.note: Tails believes that the Badnik invasions had to do with making Dr. Eggman's army cohesive.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Points taken. Do you think Eggman is back?
Without so much as an angry vlog? No way. After that last defeat, he'd make sure we knew he was back. The lack of fanfare is spooky.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Tails believe Dr. Eggman might have returned.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: In that case, I'll just keep doing what I've been doing. Those Badniks are a threat to everyone, organized or not. I'll keep traveling around, smashing every one I see.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic tells Tails that Sonic will continue destroying the Badniks as he goes around the town.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Yeah, but if they are getting orders from someone...
Then it'll make it more fun!
J-Just...be careful, okay?
cbml:panel.note: As Sonic prepares to continue saving the town, Tails believes someone is giving the Badniks orders and advises Sonic to be careful.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: If you get caught off-guard again...get hurt...
cbml:panel.note: Tails starts feeling concerned for Sonic.
Sonic notices Tails feeling worried about Sonic.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hey. Sure, we've had some close calls. But we've come out of it fine in the end, right?
Yeah, I guess.
I'll be careful. I promise.
...Okay. Thanks Sonic.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic assures Tails that he and Sonic both have had past experiences with close encounters that they went through unharmed, and Sonic promises Tails that Sonic will be careful on his mission, making Tails feel better.
